member.name: T:Bencodex.Codec
member.summary: The most basic and the lowest-level interface to encode and decode Bencodex values. This provides two types of input and output: Byte arrays and I/O Streams.

member.name: M:Bencodex.Codec.Encode(Bencodex.Types.IValue)
member.summary: Encodes a into a single Byte array, rather than split into multiple chunks.
member.returns: A single Byte array which contains the whole Bencodex representation of the .

member.name: M:Bencodex.Codec.Encode(Bencodex.Types.IValue,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Encodes a , and write it on an stream.
member.param: A stream that a value is printed on.
member.exception: Thrown when a given stream is not writable.

member.name: M:Bencodex.Codec.Decode(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Decodes an encoded value from an stream.
member.exception: Thrown when a given stream is not readable.
Thrown when a binary representation of an stream is not a valid Bencodex encoding.

member.name: M:Bencodex.Codec.Decode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decodes an encoded value from a Byte array.
member.param: A Byte array of Bencodex encoding.
member.exception: Thrown when a representation is not a valid Bencodex encoding.

member.name: T:Bencodex.CodecException
member.summary: Serves as the base class for codec exceptions.

member.name: T:Bencodex.DecodingException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when an input is not a valid Bencodex encoding so that a decoder cannot parse it.

member.name: T:Bencodex.Misc.ByteArrayComparer
member.summary: Similar to StringComparer but for Byte arrays instead of Unicode Strings.

member.name: T:Bencodex.Misc.ByteChunkQueue
member.summary:
A special-purpose queue for internal use, which accepts inserting a chunk of Bytes into and removing the number of Bytes from.
For example, if foo, bar, and baz were Pushed into a queue, the first Pop(5) returns fooba and the second Pop(5) returns rbaz.

member.name: M:Bencodex.Misc.ByteChunkQueue.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new empty queue.

member.name: P:Bencodex.Misc.ByteChunkQueue.ByteLength
member.summary: The total size of Bytes that the queue contains.

member.name: P:Bencodex.Misc.ByteChunkQueue.Empty
member.summary: Whether the queue is empty or not.

member.name: P:Bencodex.Misc.ByteChunkQueue.FirstByte
member.summary: A first Byte in the queue, unless it's empty. If the queue is empty, it is null.

member.name: M:Bencodex.Misc.ByteChunkQueue.Append(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Insert an array of Bytes chunk into the end of the queue.
member.param: A chunk of Bytes to insert.

member.name: M:Bencodex.Misc.ByteChunkQueue.Pop(System.Int64)
member.summary: Fetches the specified size () of leading Bytes and removes them from the queue.
member.param: The length of Bytes to request.
member.returns: An array of Bytes. Its size is probably the requested , but also may be less than that if there's not enough Bytes left.
member.exception: Thrown when a requested is negative or zero.

member.name: M:Bencodex.Misc.ByteChunkQueue.StartsWith(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Tests whether the queue shares the same leading Bytes with the given .
member.param: An array of Bytes to test if it's appeared in the queue at first.
member.returns: A true if the given is appeared in the queue at first, or false.

member.name: M:Bencodex.Misc.ByteChunkQueue.IndexOf(System.Byte)
member.summary: Determines the position of the given is appeared first in the queue.
member.returns: A zero-indexed offset the given is appeared in the queue. It could be -1 if does not exist in the queue.

member.name: T:Bencodex.Misc.CompositeComparer`2
member.summary: Compose given two comparers into one comparer.
member.typeparam: An element type of the first comparer.
An element type of the second comparer.

member.name: T:Bencodex.Types.Boolean
member.summary: Represents a Bencodex Boolean true (i.e., t) or false (i.e., f).

member.name: T:Bencodex.Types.IValue
member.summary: Represents a possible value in Bencodex representation.

member.name: P:Bencodex.Types.IValue.Inspection
member.summary: A JSON-like human-readable representation for debugging.

member.name: M:Bencodex.Types.IValue.EncodeIntoChunks
member.summary: Encodes the value into Byte arrays.
member.returns: Byte arrays of Bencodex representation of the value.

member.name: T:Bencodex.Types.Null
member.summary: Represents a Bencodex null value (i.e., n).
